metadata.title: Disconnected Youth By PUMA
metadata.description: This CSV file contains estimates of number of disconnected youth (aged 16-24) in Public Use Microdata Areas (PUMAs) for 50 states + DC in the United States. It includes data on the count of disconnected youth, the disconnected youth per population, and the disconnected youth density.
metadata.author: Zofia Stanley

columns.name: PUMA
columns.description: Public Use Microdata Area ID (unique within each state)

columns.name: count
columns.description: Estimate of disconnected youth (aged 16-24) in the PUMA

columns.name: disconnected_per_pop
columns.description: Estimate of disconnected youth per 1,000 residents aged 16-24 in the PUMA

columns.name: disconnected_density
columns.description: Estimate of disconnected youth per sq. km. in the PUMA
